mapper.insert: insert into `group` (avatar, number, name, num, makeuid,makeusername) values (#{avatar},#{number},#{name},#{num},#{makeUid},#{makeUserName});
mapper.select: select * from `group` where number like concat('%',#{key},'%') OR name like concat('%', #{key},'%') limit #{page},#{size};
select count(*) from `group` where number like concat('%',#{key},'%') OR name like concat('%', #{key},'%') limit #{page},#{size};
